name: Blooming With You
description:
Blooming with You is an atmospheric game where you chat with your significant other while you take care of their bonsai. 

Press space to raise or lower your phone and click on the responses to text your SO back. There are three endings based on how well you do, try to see them all! Refresh the page to start over.

Blooming with You was made in 72 hours (ish) for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep it Alive". If you like the game, feel free to go rate it on the Ludum Dare page!

UPDATE (Late April 20th, 2020): Fixed a bug where you couldn't see the whole true ending if you started the sequence with the phone down. Also adding a Windows version in case it doesn't run well in the browser on your computer.

UPDATE (April 22nd, 2020): Nothing changed about the game, but if you need help finding the best ending I've made a simple guide here so you can see it.
